dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.cbe.party.dem.DemographicCharacteristic
dataStructure.description:
A feature or quality used to make recognizable or to define somebody or something, such as age, income, education, revenue, and so forth.

This entity is abstract

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: DemographicCharacteristic

child.name: iD
child.description:
A unique identifier for the DemographicCharacteristic.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: iD

child.name: name
child.description:
A word, term, or phrase by which the characteristic is known and distinguished from characteristics.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: name

child.name: description
child.description:
A narrative that explains what the DemographicCharacteristic is.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: description

child.name: _valueType
child.description:
A kind of value that the characteristic can take on, such as numeric, text, and so forth.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: _valueType

child.name: minCardinality
child.description:
The minimum number of instances a CharacteristicValue can take on. For example, zero to five phone numbers in a group calling plan, where zero is the value for the minCardinality.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: minCardinality

child.name: maxCardinality
child.description:
The maximum number of instances a CharacteristicValue can take on. For example, zero to five phone numbers in a group calling plan, where five is the value for the maxCardinality.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: maxCardinality

child.name: extensible
child.description:
An indicator that specifies that the values for the characteristic can be extended by adding new values when instantiating a characteristic for an Entity.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: extensible

child.name: validFor
child.description:
The period of time for which a characteristic is applicable.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: validFor

child.name: unique
child.description:
An indicator that specifies if a value is unique for the specification. Possible values are; "unique while value is in effect" and "unique whether value is in effect or not"

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: unique

child.name: derivationFormula
child.description:
A rule or principle represented in symbols, numbers, or letters, often in the form of an equation used to derive the value of a characteristic value.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: derivationFormula

child.name: marketSegmentCharacteristic
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association DemographicMarketSegmentCharacteristicDefinedBy

This association end is optional
child.label: marketSegmentCharacteristic

child.name: compositeDemographicCharacteristic

This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation shared

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association CompositeDemoCharacteristicComprisedOf

This association end is optional
child.label: compositeDemographicCharacteristic

child.name: partyDemographicValue
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association DemographicCharacteristicDefines

This association end is optional
child.label: partyDemographicValue

child.name: demoCharacteristicValue
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association DemographicCharacteristicEnumeratedBy

This association end is optional
child.label: demoCharacteristicValue

child.name: partyProfileTypeCharacteristic
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has aggregation none
